title: Browser hacked?
content:
So I was reading manga and the top fifth of my monitor went white. Full white. Non-interactable. Almost like it's not there. I can't access task menus or bars. No tabs. No search. Nothing. Uninstalled and Reinstalled and problem persists. Cleared cache and cookies.

OS Info: Edition: Windows 10 Home Version: 20H2 Installed: ‎8/‎1/‎2021 OS build: 19042.1288 Experience: Windows Feature Experience Pack 120.2212.3920.0

Device Info: Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11700KF @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz Installed RAM: 16.0 GB (15.7 GB usable) System type: 64-bit operating system, x64-based processor

Mozilla Info: Up to date. Checked for updates by using keyboard commands (Ctrl+Alt+A).
creator: sierramcgivney

title: Failing to save extension data in SQLite DB
content:
I have used an extension named "Update Scanner" for several years, but now it no longer functions. The data I ask it to save is not saved, or returned when requested.

What do I need to do to get it functioning again. It is the current version 4.4.0
creator: darrell_likes2travel

title: Quando clico em notificações push do Instagram no Firefox elas não me levam pro site
content: Coisa pequena, mas vem me incomodando: as notificações push no meu Firefox funcionam normalmente, qdo clico em uma sou levada pro site. Isso tb acontecia com o Instagram, mas agora elas só pulam na tela e se clico nelas nada acontece, não sou redirecionada pro Instagram. Já limpei o cache do Firefox, já bloqueei as notificações do Instagram nas configurações do navegador e depois permiti novamente, mas isso não resolveu.
creator: jefreylidel

title: Best community forums?
content: What are the best forums for FF issues and questions? I've used Mozillazine and this forum, but I see there are also NNTP groups. What do most people use in terms of the which has the most activity? Thanks
creator: TekHelp

title: Firefox update message pop-up
content: I would like to know how to stop the Firefox pop-up update message that says "Update available. Download the latest version of Firefox". It's in my face all day long and very annoying plus it covers up the upper right corner of the screen. Please explain how to turn it off. Thanks, Phil Walen.
creator: paw32

title: lost Colorways 94
content: I got colorways, explored colors and themes, chose a theme, then wanted to just have a color, without a theme. In the process of removing the theme, I completely undid Colorways. I don't know how to get it back. Help?
creator: lnicolof1

title: firefox only updating some of my new details
content: Don't think my problem was covered in choices offered. I lost the profile folder of my old thunderbird account while migrating it to clean install of Win 11 on new pc, and have struggled to get two new addresses. Firefox has finally accepted one as primary and the other as secondary email addresses, but I cannot get it to delete my no longer existing address. I have also changed my physical address but have not seen an option to change that info. Ever since I lost my email account I have been getting thumbnails of every brain rotting thing my partner watches on Youtube, and thanks to Google every site I visit assumes I'm her. My searches are answered in gobbledygook pc language. I dont want incorrect Firefox info and Google to mess up my brand spanking new Win 11 pc or my Microsoft account before I've even used them. My pc was a still boxed, unused win 10 machine that I did not use other than to install win 11. Any ideas what to do would be most welcome. Thanks alot Alan.
creator: alansnotin
